title: Amazon Basics Large Cat Litter Box with High Sides, Open Top, Includes Scoop, 19 x 15 x 11.75 inches, Grey/Beige
description: Designed as a high sided litter box, it effectively keeps litter confined, reducing mess on your floor. This litter box is ideal for indoor cats, accommodating both large and small felines. Its high wall design also minimizes litter scatter. The front opening is lowered for seamless access, making it suitable even for older or senior cats. Crafted from durable, BPA-free, and recyclable plastic, it's designed to last. It also includes a convenient cat litter scoop that stores directly on the cat box for easy access.
